JOB DESCRIPTION: The Software Developer will assist in designing, installation, testing, and maintenance of software systems. You will be responsible for writing and coding individual programs or providing an entirely new software solution, also creating information systems by studying operations.     ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONSPRIORITIES      Reviewing current systems   Presenting ideas for system improvements, including cost proposals   Working closely with analysts, designers and staff   Producing detailed specifications and writing the program codes   Testing the product in controlled, real situations before going live   Design, run and monitor software performance tests on new and existing programs for the purpose of correcting errors   Preparation of training manuals for users   Maintaining the systems once they are up and running   Preparing a work flow chart and diagram using knowledge of computer capabilities   Analyze and assess existing business systems and procedures, collaboration with internal users and departments   Identify requirements with potential and actual clients to understand service requirements   Hands-on experience developing test cases and test plans   Ability to conduct research into software-related issues and products   Proven analytical and problem-solving abilities   Develop software systems and maintain applications and databases by evaluating client needs      QUALIFICATION:      2-10 years of experience Required in, C#, Web applications   Should be any graduate from a recognized University      You ll need to be comfortable with          Object-Oriented Concepts   Design Patterns   Net Platform   C#   Web-Based Systems   Web API   HTML, CSS   Javascript   typescript   NetMvc   MS SQL Server
